summary: Several seemingly unrelated but surprisingly intertwined tales reveal how a Japanese band that independently invented punk rock in 1975 is, 37 years later, connected to a comet that is about to destroy the world.
cast: Atsushi Itô|Kiyohiko Shibukawa|Noriko Eguchi|Hidekazu Mashima|Gaku Hamada|Takashi Yamanaka|Kazuki Namioka|Kenjirô Ishimaru|Mikako Tabe|Mirai Moriyama|Nao Ohmori|Vincent Giry|Seiko Iwaidô|Reiko Kusamura|Kengo Kôra|Yoshihiro Nagata|Yûji Nakamura|Eiko Ohtani|Akihiko Sai|Ken'ichi Takitô|Kôichi Ueda
title: Fisshu sutôrî
